body:
Do you want NCAAB Basketball Rankings? So you can do your March Madness homework, see where your school ranks, or just find out how much better Gonzaga and Baylor are than the rest of the country? Then you'll enjoy the following outputs. We update them every week and they aren't based on anything official from the NCAA or ESPN. They're better. And much more accurate. These rankings are created by a market beating sports betting Model. You simply won't find sharper outputs that help you directly compare each team. We use these rankings to try and find which teams to back for the 2021 NCAA Championship. And we visit the **[Free NCAAB Picks](https://www.betrefinery.com/ncaab-betting/free-ncaab-picks)** page for the game by game outputs. It's the same Model, this page is just a wider overview. Without further ado, let's find the top teams in the country. - - - ## **NCAAB Basketball Rankings** The following outputs are correct as at February 10th 2021. And the sportsbook odds are the best odds we could find for each team. ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaa-power-rankings-1-feb-15.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaa-power-rankings-2-feb-15.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaab-power-rankings-3-15th-jan.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaa-power-rankings-4.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaa-power-rankings-5-feb-15th.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") - - - **What does the Rating mean?** The Gonzaga Bulldogs are 26.82 points better than average. That means, they should start -26 against a school like La Salle, with a zero point Rating. On a neutral venue. The Rating doesn't include home ground advantage either. How many points is Cameron Indoor Stadium worth to Duke pre-Covid? You would add that on top of the Rating. - - - ## **NCAAB Basketball Rankings Commentary** **Gonzaga** are slightly distancing themselves from **Baylor**. But both schools are well clear of the rest of the country. Is +300 the right price to ride Gonzaga to the National Title? Hmm. If you remember the Zion Duke team at those odds, its a lot of weight to carry. We love a long price snipe. This week, that's **Virginia at 28-1**. - - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
**
title: NCAAB Basketball Rankings From An Expert Betting Model
